fields.name: Martini
fields.description: A classic cocktail made with gin and vermouth stirred or shaken and garnished with an olive or lemon twist.

fields.name: Manhattan
fields.description: A cocktail made with whiskey, sweet vermouth, and bitters, stirred and garnished with a cherry.

fields.name: Margarita
fields.description: A popular cocktail made with tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur, served with salt on the rim of the glass.

fields.name: Daiquiri
fields.description: A simple but delicious cocktail made with rum, lime juice, and sugar, shaken and served up.

fields.name: Old Fashioned
fields.description: A classic cocktail made with whiskey, sugar, bitters, and a twist of citrus peel. Served over ice and garnished with a cherry.

fields.name: Negroni
fields.description: A bitter and refreshing cocktail made with gin, sweet vermouth, and Campari, stirred and garnished with an orange peel.

fields.name: Cosmopolitan
fields.description: A popular cocktail made with vodka, cranberry juice, and lime juice, shaken and strained into a martini glass.

fields.name: Mai Tai
fields.description: A tropical cocktail made with rum, lime juice, orange curaçao, and orgeat syrup, served over ice and garnished with fresh mint and fruit.

fields.name: Piña Colada
fields.description: A classic tropical cocktail made with rum, pineapple juice, and coconut cream, blended with ice and served with a pineapple wedge and cherry.

fields.name: Bloody Mary
fields.description: A savory cocktail made with vodka, tomato juice, and a blend of spices and seasonings, served over ice and garnished with celery and other vegetables.

fields.name: Mojito
fields.description: A refreshing cocktail made with rum, lime juice, sugar, and fresh mint, served over ice and topped with soda water.

fields.name: Whiskey Sour
fields.description: A classic cocktail made with whiskey, lemon juice, and sugar, shaken and served up or on the rocks.

fields.name: Sidecar
fields.description: A classic cocktail made with cognac, orange liqueur, and lemon juice, shaken and served up in a sugar-rimmed glass.

fields.name: Gimlet
fields.description: A simple but delicious cocktail made with gin and lime juice, shaken and served up or on the rocks.

fields.name: Sazerac
fields.description: A New Orleans classic made with rye whiskey, absinthe, bitters, and a sugar cube, stirred and served up in a chilled glass.

fields.name: Moscow Mule
fields.description: A refreshing cocktail made with vodka, ginger beer, and lime juice, served in a copper mug.

fields.name: French 75
fields.description: A sparkling cocktail made with gin, lemon juice, sugar, and Champagne, served in a Champagne flute.

fields.name: Dark and Stormy
fields.description: A spicy cocktail made with dark rum, ginger beer, and lime juice, served over ice.

fields.name: Mint Julep
fields.description: A classic Southern cocktail made with bourbon, sugar, and fresh mint, served over crushed ice and garnished with a mint sprig.
